Speed.name: Model Boost Ability
Speed.desc: Initial model speed has a boost for a short time.

Speed.name: Instant Accelerator Switch Ability
Speed.desc: Accelerator Switches complete instantly when driven on.

Power.name: Color Changing Bolts Ability
Power.desc: Gives the ability to fire tintable bolts

Power.name: Armor Buff 1
Power.desc: Model upgraded to have 5 Armor Hearts

Power.name: Instant Tow Bar
Power.desc: Tow Bars complete instantly with vehicles that have them

Power.name: Armor Buff 2
Power.desc: Model upgraded to have 6 armor hearts.

Power.name: Instant Sonar Smash
Power.desc: Sonar smashes complete instantly rather than shaking.

Weapons.name: Explode Ability
Weapons.desc: Model explodes after a countdown (toggle off/on)

Weapons.name: Spinning Weapon
Weapons.desc: Spinning objects are now fired to destroy distant threats

Weapons.name: Electric Shield
Weapons.desc: An electric field surrounds the model

Weapons.name: Speaker Attack Ability
Weapons.desc: Music makes nearby enemies dance for a set time.

Extras.name: Bolt Color Chooser
Extras.desc: Allows you to tint bolt colors

Extras.name: Guardian Ability
Extras.desc: Model will protect you by attacking enemies (needs an active weapon selected).

Extras.name: Character Studs Ability
Extras.desc: Enemies now give off lots of studs when they are defeated.

Extras.name: Stud Magnet Ability
Extras.desc: Studs are attracted to the vehicle

Colors.name: Skin 1
Colors.desc: Changes the appearance of the model

Colors.name: Tire Color Chooser
Colors.desc: Allows you to pick tire colors

Colors.name: Skin 3
Colors.desc: Changes the appearance of the model.

Colors.name: Model Color Chooser
Colors.desc: Allows you to pick model color.
